qas.question: How many votes does each Football Association Premier League Ltd (FAPL) club have on issues?

answers.text: Each club is a shareholder, with one vote each on issues such as rule changes and contracts.

qas.question: Who is the chairman of the FAPL and when was he appointed?

answers.text: The current chairman is Sir Dave Richards, who was appointed in April 199

qas.question: Why did John Quinton and Peter Leaver resign as chairman and chief excutive?

answers.text: John Quinton and Peter Leaver, were forced to resign in March 1999 after awarding consultancy contracts to former Sky executives Sam Chisholm and David Chance.

qas.question: Does the Football Association say about the management of the Premier League?

answers.text: has veto power as a special shareholder during the election of the chairman and chief executive and when new rules are adopted by the league.

answers.text: the daily operations of the league

qas.question: For what reason does FAPL select a chairman, chief executive and vice president?

context: The <b11_0>Football Association Premier League<b11_0/> Ltd (FAPL) is operated as a corporation and is owned by the <b9_0><b10_0>20<b10_0/><b9_0/> <a4_0>member clubs<a4_0/>. <a0_0>Each club is <b12_0>a shareholder<b12_0/>, with <a5_0>one<a5_0/> vote each on issues such as rule changes and contracts.<a0_0/> The clubs elect a chairman, chief executive, and board of directors to <b13_0>oversee <a6_0>the daily operations of the league<b13_0/><a6_0/>. <a1_0>The current chairman is <a7_0>Sir Dave Richards<a7_0/>, who was appointed in April 199<a1_0/>9, and the chief executive is <a8_0>Richard Scudamore<a8_0/>, appointed in November 1999. The former chairman and chief executive, <a2_0>John Quinton and Peter Leaver, were forced to resign in March 1999 after awarding consultancy contracts to former Sky executives Sam Chisholm and David Chance.<a2_0/> The Football Association is not directly involved in the day-to-day operations of the Premier League, but <a3_0>has veto power as a special shareholder during the election of the chairman and chief executive and when new rules are adopted by the league.
